backend/courses/course-content.mo: Defines Course type and createCourseDatabase function that returns a Map of persistent course content for Mathematics, Science, English, Hindi, and Social Studies across grades 1-12 with details like syllabus, objectives, and pass marks.
backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, course enrollment, fee payment system (₹500 monthly/₹4800 annual), and course query operations (getAllCourses, getCoursesBySubject, getCoursesByGrade) with authorization checks using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files describing the React application structure with TanStack Router, authentication, course browsing, enrollment, and payment features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining colors for UI elements like background, foreground, primary, secondary, borders, and charts.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Glorious Cyber School application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for Home, Courses, CourseDetail, Dashboard, About, Enrollment, and FeePayment pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with Layout and ProfileSetup components.
frontend/src/components/CourseCard.tsx: Reusable course card component displaying course icon, title, description, grade level, and difficulty badge with hover effects, linking to course detail page using Course type from backend.
Component fetching and displaying up to 6 featured courses in a grid using useGetAllCourses hook, with loading state, empty state handling, and link to view all courses.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying school information, quick navigation links, contact details, and copyright notice with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header component with logo, navigation menu (desktop and mobile), and authentication-aware links that show Dashboard/Enrollment/Fee Payment when logged in.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that combines Header, Footer, and children content in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error handling for duplicate authentication.
frontend/src/components/PaymentHistory.t: Displays a table of payment records with status badges, payment types, amounts in INR, and formatted dates, fetched via useGetPaymentHistory hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, preventing dismissal until profile setup is complete.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, enrollments, payments, courses, and fee structures using the backend actor. Includes query invalidation and toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, featuring warm cream backgrounds, vibrant orange primary, and fresh green secondary colors. Includes utility classes for hero gradients and card hover effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page displaying Glorious Cyber School's mission, vision, CBSE approach, and contact information with icons and statistics in a grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/CourseDetail.tsx: Course detail page that fetches and displays comprehensive information about a specific course by ID, including subject icon, grade level, difficulty, and enrollment options for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/Courses.tsx: Courses listing page with grade-level filtering using a dropdown selector, displaying courses in a grid layout with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Protected dashboard page showing authenticated user's profile, enrolled courses, and payment history with loading states and authentication redirect.
frontend/src/pages/Enrollment.tsx: Student enrollment page with form to select grade level (1-12) and course (Mathematics, Science, English, Hindi, Social Studies), requiring authentication and displaying user profile name from backend.
frontend/src/pages/FeePayment.tsx: Fee payment page allowing enrolled students to initiate monthly (₹500) or annual (₹4800) payments, showing savings calculation and payment confirmation with generated payment ID.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero section, three feature cards (CBSE Curriculum, Expert Teachers, Quality Education), and featured courses section showcasing the K12 education platform.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extending colors (using OKLCH color space), fonts (Inter, Poppins), animations (accordion, fade-in), and including typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting the K12 CBSE education platform rebuild from Google Sites, including architectural notes (domain, subjects, contact info, fee structure) and completed features list.
